example: Large corporations own many of the big farms in the USA.
They have a lot of money to buy large machines and equipment.

kana: のうぎょうろうどうしゃ
example: Many immigrants work as farm laborers because wages are high.
Using technology helps to increase food production.
Companies process food to make it ready for the supermarket.
They use technology to develop new chemical fertilizers.
Each area has different soil, temperatures, and rainfall.
The center pivot method is a way to water crops in dry areas.
In a feedlot, many cattle are kept in a small area to get fat.
There are suitable crops for the environment of each area.
